column5: LOL!  This is sick. Good prank for Hallowe'en.
Love Bites In the dead of night, Love Bites,  -Judas Priest 198?
*Pssssssst*.  Don't forget the wonders of photoshop.  This didn't really happen.
Why do you hate real love?
Judas Priest - 1984...from the Defenders of the Faith album

As much as I love my wife and with Valentines Day only one day away, I'm pretty sure that I'd take a pass on this! I already have enough problems with the oriface's God gave me! I can only immagine the grief I would be in for, if I messed with what the "all-mighty" has already given me! HH
In Clives defence, There are few wives who have not given their husbands the finger at some time.
Not married are you........

Believe it or not, I was willing to go through with this procedure     and pm'ed Mepps about it. Then I thought about it, smacked myself around abit, and to make a long story short, I still have all my digits  .
First of all WOW!    I mean I love fishindevil but I would like to keep all my fingers and do it the simple and painless way, I would prefer a ring instead!LOL
Rings are sooo passe...   Gerritt

Oh yee gawds!  Rubber Bands and 151?  Mondo bizarro.  You gonna be at the show this saturday Clive?  I wanna see the stub!  gnawww.  Grant, i think it's time we took our friendship to a new level...  We could be hook buddays! lol
WOW, this internet "story" resurfaced, Saw this over a year ago, or more, and Clive still has all his digits intact.
I'm flattered Fidel. I'm in for 1 finger and I raise you a toe.  BTW, got your message. You know me and weekends. Perhaps one morning/afternoon next week? Do call.

Still got all 20 digits boys April fools came early this year!  As for the hooks, I was tired of people telling me I was hurtign the fish and would never put a hook in myself...   How many fishermen can honestly say they know what its like to be "hooked"
... not for constipation it aint!!!
seems I remember this from last year
We are all "hooked" Clive.......
I meant literally, not figuratively.
Did you add any faver beans to the meal ?  I guess a bottle of rums cheaper than a ring.
Master Angler,  Human pinata,  Re-animator,  Is there anything you can't do?
Wah! My fingers cold Wah!  I'll bet as a kid playing cops and robbers, he had a sawed off shotgun!
That's just super!  Forget tatoos with each others names, this is the future of L.O.V.E!  What a story to tell the Grandkids.  L.O.V.E.=lopping off valuable extremities
lol Snag, there really isnt anything I cant do...well, except breathing underwater, but im working on that.
Gosh,  Really getting some mileage out of your self mutilation.  Love interest stories are so captivating.   Ya know,  You kinda look a bit like Van Gough.  How 'bout an ear fer yer bud?
Gillian said the new reel you got for Xmas,  Cost an arm and a leg.  Pics?

Here's the deal,  I met up with Clive (AKA- MEPPS, or Mr.Stumpy) to go fishing the other day.    I have to say that I started getting annoyed with him.  He kept complaining that his missing finger is sensitive to the cold.  As well, he dropped a few things because of his missing digit.  Gillian keeps whining that she misses playing the piano, trumpet and trombone.  Don't get me wrong, I'm a romantic, Clive and Gillian are great,  But what they did was crazy.  For some of you newer members, here is the story.  I'll warn you, it's graphic.  http://www.bmezine.com/news/pubring/20050401.html    printed 01/04/05  I am a pretty tolerant guy, but I have to say that this "act of love" has hurt our relationship.  I hope nobody else gets this crazy  Anyways, Happy Valentines Day!
I hope this is a joke.  If not, this is truly bizzare to me.  I don;t get it... Wow.....  Sherriff
Bizzaro, senioro.
That's just nuts man!!!  I'm kind of attached to my fingers.  Wonder if that will slow down their typing speed at all  Joey
Thats awesome
I almost forgot about that story...

Thats one of the most unbelievable things I've ever read....  judge not lest ye not be judged.. I say...  When I met Clive for the first time.. I said... "wow.. wierd but normal dude..."  That was when he had the hoops in his ears... which being a northern hick like redneck  I thought was pretty cool...  Now would I bite my finger off for my wife... not likely now that we are married.. lol .... would i get it bitten off in her defense... absoultley...  as far as Im concerned.. in your own mind, maybe there is/was no difference...  Clive...  If I was gonna do it though... I would have shot it off...
A little crazy glue and the end of an old broomstick, and you're good to go again!!!
At least last year's hoax was fishing related.
That's your cure for everthing GCD!

I have seen this before (suspension) Clive... and thought how the hell do they handle the pain involved.... http://www.bmezine.com/cured/bvi-full.wmv  Meditation? Pain killers? both? what about infection... I ask because I am interested not asking as a slam... perhaps you could explain it to me via pm?   Gerritt.
that is dedication!!! what a Story!
I wouldn't last long as a fish... I took it HOOK, LINE AND SINKER!!!
I also have scars in my mouth from biting.........................................
Clicked on the link here at work and guess what?  It's been blocked!! LOL.  Now i'm really interested to see what it's all about....haha.
Where did you find that?  Crazy kids  They should find a better way to hang out.
http://www.uvatiarru.com/   Gerritt.
weird  to each there own but i really like my digits where they are
I'd give my right arm to be ambidextrous.
LOL
1 THUMBS UP!
I think we need a few set of pliers or bolt cutters. A few guys took the hooks really deep here.

W-O-W...........Clive....!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!..and Gillian! Quivers down my backbone...... I got the shakes in my knee bone.....  Gonna show this to the wife on Valentines Day........ She going to look at me and simply state....'What you thinking Lad..what you thinking' Yessirr.........Dont really know how to respond to this post at all...not at all. Clive an Gillian....if you folk ended up with never ending devoted love from this........then my hat goes off to you.  Most likely you were made for each other...... Dont get me wrong here folks..Im not slamming you at all To each his own...and I believe in love Peter
